sentences: Puges jänesena laeva ja sõitis Ameerikasse.
On juba mitu aastat jäneseid pidanud.
context: The word 'ameerikasse' is the illative case form of 'Ameerika' (America), indicating movement towards or into America. It means 'to America' or 'into America'. This form shows the direction of motion to the country of America.
